text:
<@U69BL50BF>
Really minor problems!
Fixed with <https://github.com/FluxML/Metalhead.jl/pull/75> and <https://github.com/FluxML/Flux.jl/pull/1476>
Bumped the compat of Flux and Colors for Metalhead.jl
Bumped the compat of Adapt for Flux.jl
Metalhead works now!

For the time being(before the above PRs get merged), if anyone wants to install Flux and Metalhead(and are ready to work with Flux 0.12dev), they can just add my repo from the above two PRs:slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text:

text:
Oh I just saw these in GitHub :stuck_out_tongue:

I've left a comment on the Metalhead PR, it's claiming compat with an unreleased version of Flux which is a bit weird.

elements.text: Oh I just saw these in GitHub
I've left a comment on the Metalhead PR, it's claiming compat with an unreleased version of Flux which is a bit weird.

text: The Flux PR is merged (pending CI) and the other looks good modulo the Flux compat. It doesn't hurt to have compat in a manifest on master, but prolly not on a released version.

elements.text: The Flux PR is merged (pending CI) and the other looks good modulo the Flux compat. It doesn't hurt to have compat in a manifest on master, but prolly not on a released version.

text:
<@UC4QQPG4A> Yeah! Its the master branch of Flux
The pull which fixes Flux's Project.toml version problem with Adapt.jl will get merged to the master branch of Flux, which is 0.12.0dev, and won't affect 0.11.4 in any way.

elements.text:
Yeah! Its the master branch of Flux
The pull which fixes Flux's Project.toml version problem with Adapt.jl will get merged to the master branch of Flux, which is 0.12.0dev, and won't affect 0.11.4 in any way.

text: So even if both get merged, it doesn't solve the problem with Flux 0.11.4. The problem only gets solved with 0.12.0dev

elements.text: So even if both get merged, it doesn't solve the problem with Flux 0.11.4. The problem only gets solved with 0.12.0dev

text:
My suggestion is, merge the Metalhead PR, and release a new minor version of Metalhead when Flux 0.12.0 is released?

The users can use master of both Flux and Metalhead if they want to use Metalhead:smiley:
